name: @kewal89/advance-console
description: Advance Consoles For VS Code & Browsers. Created For Fun. Not For Production.

scripts.build: rm -rf build/ && npx tsc && cp -R src/types build && prettier --write build/**/*
scripts.postbuild: cp package.json build/package.json && cp README.md build/README.md && cp LICENSE build/LICENSE
scripts.pub: yarn build && cd build && yarn pub1 && yarn pub2

author: Kewal89
